pointset.description: Incorporated places in the United States (excluding the U.S. territories) with a population of at least 100,000 on July 1, 2020, as estimated by the United States Census Bureau.
The Global Airport Database (GADB) is a FREE downloadable database of 9300 airports big and small from all around the world under the MIT License.
Metropolitan Combined Statistical Areas as determined by the U.S. Census Bureau as of January 1, 2020.
Military Installations as determined by the U.S. Census Bureau as of January 1, 2020.
